name: Quicxo - The Demake
description:
Sumea's classic mobile game now on itch.io!

Poor Quicxo... So many blocks and so little time!
Help Quicxo: place the blocks next to each other so that the colours on the sides match. Quicxo is happy as long as you can help him quickly enough.

Authors:
Sumea – Original game for Java based NOKIA and Siemens phones. (2002 & 2003)
SopuisaSopuli – Demake for #nokiajam (Nokia 3310 Jam 2) using TIC-80. (2020)

Huge thanks to Bear_Thorne for Collision example. It helped me to get started.

Controls:
Keyboard (Tic-80 buttons)

Arrows: Move blocksZ (A)Place a block
(only if cell is empty and colours on the sides match!)
X (B)Swap a block (6 times for each block)S (Y)
Toggle pause

Have fun!
